headline: Goldman Sachs says we’re on the verge of a stablecoin gold rush worth trillions
summary: U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent believes stablecoins will buoy the market for U.S. Treasuries, and the government will sell more short-term debt to meet that demand.
